text: The A15 is a short autoroute (motorway) in France. It goes through the suburbs of the northwest of Paris. It is about long. ==Exits and junctions== Junction number & name Westbound exits Eastbound exits 1 A86, Gennevilliers A86, Gennevilliers RN311, Argenteuil, Épinay-sur-Seine, Bezons RN311, Argenteuil, Épinay-sur-Seine, Bezons 3 A115 RN14, Franconville RN14, Franconville La Patte d'Oie d'Herblay RN14, Herblay RN14, Herblay RN14, Beauchamp RN14, Beauchamp RN14, Pierrelaye 7 RN184, Eragny-sur-Oise, Saint-Ouen-l'Aumône RN184, Eragny-sur-Oise, Saint-Ouen-l'Aumône 8 RD984 Rue Guichard/Avenue de Verdun, Saint-Ouen-l'Aumône 9 Boulevard du Port, Cergy Boulevard du Port, Cergy RD922/RD915 Boulevard de la Viosne, Cergy RD922/RD915 Boulevard de la Viosne, Cergy Puiseux-Pontoise, Osny Puiseux-Pontoise, Osny Puiseux-Pontoise Puiseux-Pontoise Puiseux-Pontoise ==References== Category:Autoroutes in France
title: A15 autoroute
